name: Remain in Conflict
description:
War Never Changes Arcade Mode

Survive 5 rounds of chaos against innumerable enemies!

Controls:  

Mouse - Camera     WASD - Move     Left Click - Shoot

Can you overcome the impossible hordes of enemies? 

Local Mode

Play against another player!

Controls: 

Player 1: WASD to move, Space to fire

Player 2: Arrows to move, Lft Ctrl to fire

(┛◉Д◉)┛彡┻━┻  

Crafted with love by @muitxer
